overview: Kudret Turk, was born in 1977 in Sakarya. Finished elementary and high school in Sakarya as well. Gratuated from MuÄŸla University Computer Science in 1999. Started working in Mikro Yazilimevi (www.mikro.com.tr - one of the leading software company in Turkey) in the same year. Worked in the development of Windows based ERP software. In 2002 I have completed his MBA in “Informatics Institute of Istanbul Technical University”. After his military service in Land Forces Department of Information as an Computer Systems Officer, returned to his career in Mikro. Made his first venture with Apsiyon in 2010.
